# Test Analysis Agent

**Context:** Automatically loaded when user mentions "analisar testes", "test coverage", "test metrics", "test quality".

## Agent in This Category

- **[Test Analysis](agent-prompt.md)** - Analyzes test coverage, quality metrics, execution patterns

## When to Load This Agent

```
#file .github/agents/test_analysis/agent-prompt.md
```

**Use cases:**
- Test coverage analysis
- Test quality metrics
- Execution pattern optimization
- Test suite health checks

**Integration:** Part of the Test Strategy suite - load via `test-strategy/AGENTS.md` for strategic planning.
